alert.note: Alert for Madison; Washington (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 15 at 7:40PM CDT until May 15 at 8:30PM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tulsa has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Madison County in northwestern Arkansas... Central Washington County in northwestern Arkansas... * Until 830 PM CDT. * At 740 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 4 miles southwest of Tontitown, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations in or near the path include... Fayetteville... Springdale... Huntsville... Farmington... Elkins... Tontitown... West Fork... Greenland... St. Paul... Hindsville... Wesley... Saint Paul... Aurora... Japton... Drake Field Airport... Johnson... Elm Springs... Goshen... Georgetown... Walnut Grove... This includes Interstate 49 between mile markers 55 and 73. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
